clauses.question: 1. What process should the Government use to set a new emissions reduction target in legislation?
clauses.notes:
None. The government should not be considering carbon as an emission or greenhouse gas. CO2 is essential for plant life. I breath
 out CO2. Volcanos breath out CO2. Natural burning forrests give off CO2. CO2 is NOT bad, its good.. Wake up!

clauses.question: 2. If the Government sets a 2050 target now, which is the best target for New Zealand?
3. How should New Zealand meet its targets?
4. Should the Zero Carbon Bill allow the 2050 target to be revised if circumstances change?
5. The Government proposes that three emissions budgets of five years each (i.e. covering the next 15 years) be in place at any given time. Do you agree with this proposal?
clauses.notes:
There should be no budget or government spending to control a natural emission relating to CO2.. Other gasses proven to be
 harmfull should be considered only with proof... proof! and not by some C+ scientist paid for by the government!

clauses.question: 6. Should the Government be able to alter the last emissions budget (i.e. furthest into the future)?
clauses.notes: No government control should be used to control CO2.

clauses.question: 7. Should the Government have the ability to review and adjust the second emissions budget within a specific range under exceptional circumstances? See p36 Our Climate Your Say
clauses.notes: No emissions budget should be given to government for control of CO2.

clauses.question: 8. Do you agree with the considerations we propose that the Government and the Climate Change Commission take into account when advising on and setting budgets? See p44 Our Climate Your Say
clauses.notes:
No government or commission should be setting budgets to control how an essential gas like CO2 should be controlled.. We need
 this gas to support plant growth. There is also no scientific correlation between climate change and CO2 levels.. The climate has

 been changing from the beginning of time. Adapt! not control!

clauses.question: 9. Should the Zero Carbon Bill require Governments to set out plans within a certain timeframe to achieve the emissions budgets?
clauses.notes: No. I dont want government controlling climate in any way during any time frame.

clauses.question: 10. What are the most important issues for the Government to consider in setting plans to meet budgets? For example, who do we need to work with, what else needs to be considered?
clauses.notes:
None. Let nature and climate change be.. Climate change will only get worse if government intervenes, like everything else

government intervenes in..

clauses.question: 11. The Government has proposed that the Climate Change Commission advises on and monitors New Zealand's progress towards its goals. Do you agree with these functions? See p42 Our Climate Your Say
clauses.notes:
We don't need a climate change commission. Let the climate change as it will, and adapt to the change as it happens.. Controlling
CO2 will not have any reducing effect on climate change.

clauses.question: 12. What role do you think the Climate Change Commission should have in relation to the New Zealand Emissions Trading Scheme (NZ ETS)?
clauses.notes: None.. there should be no ETS. The ETS is a scam!

clauses.question: 13. The Government has proposed that Climate Change Commissioners need to have a range of essential and desirable expertise. Do you agree with the proposed expertise? See p45 Our Climate Your Say
clauses.notes: There is no logic in wasting money on experts with an imaginary agenda to controlling CO2 emmissions.

clauses.question: 14. Do you think the Zero Carbon Bill should cover adapting to climate change?
clauses.notes:
The zero carbon emmission concept is a fake science to begin with. Carbon dioxide is essential for our climate. Humans will adapt to
real climate change regardless and don't need government to lead us down a path that destroys our economy and our climate..

clauses.question: 15. The Government has proposed a number of new functions to help us adapt to climate change. Do you agree with the proposed functions? See p47 Our Climate Your Say
clauses.notes:
What a load of crap! Climate change is NOT locked in from historic emmissions.. Climate change is natural and will happen if we are

here or not.. Government will destroy us with it's bullcrap science long before the climate will have any serious effect on our humanity.
Adapting to our environment is normal, and we certainly don't need government to do this on our behalf. Government hinders

humanities positive flow forward, it does not help it..

clauses.question: 16. Should we explore setting up a targeted adaptation reporting power that could see some organisations share information on their exposure to climate change risks?
clauses.notes: No. For god sake no! Let the climate alone. You have no clue how it works!

clauses.question: Do you have any other comments you'd like to make?
clauses.notes:
Climate change is a natural ongoing event, and is not caused by carbon. The government can help by staying out of something it

knows nothing about. Why on earth would government want to minimize production of one of the most essential compounds like
CO2. This is what supports plant growth and our existence, and the main reason we are thriving on this planet..
